/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant scene from a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is adorned with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
